summary: Learn the technical concepts involved in configuring CIPA filters. Feel free to [skip this module](/learning-paths/modules/security/dns-filtering-account/) if you have a technical background.
abstract:
By the end of this module, you will be able to:

  • Describe the purpose of DNS.
  • Outline the general steps of a DNS lookup.
  • Explain how DNS filtering works to control which websites users can access.
title: Concepts
